argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dmatval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | dmatval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | dmatval.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | dmatval.d | |- D = ( N DMat R ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_dmatel | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. D <-> ( M e. B /\ A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i M j ) = .0. ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( M e. B /\ A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i M j ) = .0. ) ) -> M e. B ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. D -> M e. B ) ) |
